text: Karavan may refer to: *Karavan, a hard rock band from Pakistan *Karavan (album), an album of Serbian rock band Galija *Karavan, Batken, a village in Batken Region, Kyrgyzstan *the former name of Kerben, Kyrgyzstan, a town in Jalal-Abad Region, Kyrgyzstan *Karevan, a village in Hormozgan Province, Iran
title: Karavan (disambiguation)
